name: Aligner
description:
ALIGNER

A game where you need to use one bullet to kill multiple enemies

Inspired from the Tank Chase scene in Indiana Jones, the game aims to challenge players to use as few ammo as possible while trying shoot their way out from the enemies.

It currently includes 19 levels.

CONTROLS:

WASD or Arrow Keys to control main character, Mouse to Aim, Left Click to shoot.
'R' to fast restart a level, if you are up for the challenge :)

CREDITS:

Modelling, Design, Animation, Programming

Firat Ozbay

Modelling, Design, Level Design

Duru Can Dundar
